bug.author: ejoebstl
bug.summary: Voronoi Seam Finder requests Mat from UMat with ACCESS_READ, but also writes to Mat
bug.description: VoronoiSeamFinder requests Mat from UMat with ACCESS_READ, but also performs write operations. Please see <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/modules/stitching/src/seam_finders.cpp>https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/modules/stitching/src/seam_finders.cpp</denchmark-link> , line 118, 157 and 159. If this is a valid operation, please update the documentation of the Mat class accordingly.
